content: doily #36 1 crochet doily № 36 crème brûlée pattern by papushoipatterns materials yarnart violet cotton thread 50 g / 1 76 oz / 308 yards / 282 m per skein 20 g / 0 7 oz / 123 yards / 112 m 2 mm hook finished size 8 / 20 cm i hope you enjoy this pattern if you find any errors or typos please let me know pollinka911@gmail com you can find other patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/polina- papushoi you can support my work and buy me a coffee skein of thread here h ttps //www buymeacoffee com/ papushoi copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #36 2 terminology us chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble triple crochet fp- complete stitch around the post from front to back bp- complete stitch around the post from back to front decrease 2 or more indicated stitches joined together at the top popcorn complete the number of stitches into the stitch or space indicated drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through cluster 2 or more indicated stitches worked into the same stitch or space and joined together at the top picot chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from the hook each round ends with slip_stitch in the 1st st of the round *_* = repeat around crochet stitches tutorial video https //youtu be/lvief5ialws round s highlight color corresponds to the thread color pattern 0 chain 14 join to form a circle 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and throughout 27 double_crochet in the circle join 28 double_crochet 2 chain 1 single_crochet in first double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 *single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2* around join 14 single_crochet 28 ch2-spaces 14 double_crochet copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #36 3 3 slip_stitch chain 3 double_crochet in next space fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet *2 double_crochet in each of the next 2 spaces fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet* around 2 double_crochet in last space join 56 double_crochet 14 fp-4dc-popcorns 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip fp-4dc-popcorn *double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet skip fp-4dc-popcorn* around double_crochet in each of the last 2 double_crochet join 56 double_crochet 5 bp-slip_stitch around first double_crochet chain 3 counts as first bp-double_crochet *bp-double_crochet around next double_crochet* around join 56 bp-double_crochet 6 chain 2 2dc-cluster in first bp-double_crochet counts as first 3dc-cluster here and throughout chain 3 skip 1 bp-double_crochet *3dc-cluster in next bp-double_crochet chain 3 skip 1 bp-double_crochet* around join 28 3dc-clusters 28 ch3-spaces 7 slip_stitch chain 2 2dc-cluster in next space chain 4 *3dc-cluster in next space chain 4* around join 28 3dc-clusters 28 ch4-spaces 8 fp-slip_stitch around first 3dc-cluster chain 3 counts as first fp-double_crochet 4 double_crochet in next space *fp-double_crochet around next 3dc-cluster 4 double_crochet in next space* around join 28 fp-double_crochet 112 double_crochet
